str2: And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report. From martus; to be a witness, i.e. Testify.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare. From apo and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From aion; perpetual.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Whosoever, whichsoever, whatsoever.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
